Uses of Interface
org.seedstack.scheduler.SchedulingContext

  • Packages that use SchedulingContext 
    Package Description
    org.seedstack.scheduler
    Contains classes for scheduling tasks.

    • Uses of SchedulingContext in org.seedstack.scheduler

      Methods in org.seedstack.scheduler with parameters of type SchedulingContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TaskListener.after(SchedulingContext sc)
      Called after the Task is executed.
      void TaskListener.before(SchedulingContext sc)
      Called before the Task is executed.
      void Task.execute(SchedulingContext sc)
      This method is called by the scheduler when the task is executed.
      void TaskListener.onException(SchedulingContext sc, Exception e)
      Called if any exception occurs.
